verses.verseString: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: In the name of Allah, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: The quest for increase distracts you.
Indeed, you will come to know.
Surely, you will definitely come to realize.
Certainly, if only you knew with absolute certainty.
Then, you will surely see it with the eye of reality.
Then, on that Day, you will be questioned about the pleasures.
